description: half-length portrait of man turned left and looking out; wearing flat white collar, doublet and cloak; gesturing toward viewer with right hand
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: CORNELIUS POELENBOURCH / HOLLANDUS PICTOR IN MINORIBUS / FIGURIS HUMANIS / Ant. van Dyck pinxit / Petrus de Iode Sculpsit/ cum privilegio | on sheet in pencil: 2-214
title: Portrait of Cornelius Poelenbourch
